augments.name: Standard Shardarmor
augments.effect:
Equip to target Unit.
If it would take damage, you can sacrifice this card and prevent that damage instead.

augments.name: Standard Shardshield
augments.effect:
Equip to target Unit.
It gains Guardian (Exhaust this card to make an attacking Unit attack this one instead.).
When the equipped Unit uses Guardian - It gets +1000 this turn.

augments.name: Standard Shardsword
augments.effect:
Equip to target unit.
It gets +500 and Target Attack.

augments.name: Vrscika, the Scorpion Hammer
augments.effect:
Equip to target unit.
It gets +1000.
If the equipped unit destroys a unit with Guardian in battle - You may switch the equipped unit to active.

augments.name: True King's Greatsword
augments.effect:
Equip to target unit. The equipped unit gets +500. Whenever the equipped card destroys a unit in battle - Place two counters on this card.
Remove a counter from this card: Deal 1000 to target unit.
Remove two counters from this card: Deal 1000 to target face-up tower.

augments.name: Altar of the Dragon God
augments.effect: Exhaust, pay 1: Destroy target Dragon Unit you control, and, if you do, search your deck for a Dragon Unit with the same cost and put it into play.

augments.name: Ariana's Amulet
augments.effect:
Arrive (When this card enters the field zone.) - Draw one card
Sacrifice this card: All Spirits lose all abilities until your next turn.

augments.name: Blessed Shardcloak
augments.effect:
Equip to target Unit.
It cannot be targeted by Spells.

augments.name: Corum War Room
augments.effect:
Your Gear cost 1 less to play.
Exhaust, sacrifice this card: Equip target Gear from your discard zone to target Unit you control.

augments.name: Delayed Poison
augments.effect:
Equip to target unit.
At the start of your next turn - Destroy the equipped Unit.

augments.name: Dragonic Zone
augments.effect: Exhaust: Target Fire Unit gets +1000 this turn. Sacrifice this card: Return target Dragon Unit from your discard zone to your hand.

augments.name: Hidden Laboratory
augments.effect:
Arrive (When this card enters the field zone.) - Place three counters on your Champion if it is "Hoenna, Immoral Conjurer".
Exhaust, sacrifice a Golem Unit: Draw one card.

augments.name: Kalibur, the Sacred Shardsword
augments.effect:
Equip to target Unit.
It gets +1000.
Sacrifice this card: This turn the equipped Unit cannot be targeted by Spells or Abilities. Draw one card.
You can only control one "Kalibur, the Sacred Shardsword".

augments.name: Longinus, Mythical Shardlance
augments.effect:
Equip to target Unit.
It gets +1000.
Sacrifice this card: Deal 1500 to target Unit.
You can only control one "Longinus, Mythical Shardlance".

augments.name: Monarch's Sky Dagger
augments.effect:
Equip to target Unit.
Arrive (When this card enters the field zone.) - Put one counter on this card.
Remove a counter from this card: Choose one.
* Deal 500 to target Unit.
* Equipped Unit gains +500 this turn.
If this card is in your discard zone, when an Air Unit is returned from the field to your hand - You can add this card to your hand.

augments.name: Philosopher's Stone
augments.effect:
Arrive (When this card enters the field zone.) - Expel all Golem Units from your discard zone, and place one counter on this card for each.
Exhaust, remove any number of counters from this card: Search your deck for a Dark Unit with cost equal to the number of counters removed, and put it into play.
At the end of a turn - If this card has no counters, sacrifice it.

augments.name: Shard Research Facility
augments.effect:
Arrive (When this card enters the field zone.) - Place counters on this card equal to the number of Water Units you control.
Exhaust, remove any number of counters from this card: Add target Spell from your discard zone with cost equal to the number of counters removed.
At the end of a turn - If this card has no counters on it, sacrifice it.

augments.name: Shining Shardagger
augments.effect:
Equip to target Unit.
It gets +500 and Quickness.

augments.name: Skytree Command Center
augments.effect:
When a unit is returned to your hand from the field - Place one counter on this card for each.
Exhaust, remove any number of counters from this card: Put into play one unit from your hand with cost equal to the number of counters removed.

augments.name: Statue at the Argent Tower
augments.effect:
Arrive (When this card enters the field zone.) - Draw one card.
Sacrifice this card: Shuffle up to three target Units from your discard zone into your deck.

augments.name: Academy of Argos
augments.effect:
When you attack with a Witch - Place one counter on this card.
Once per turn, if you were to use Shard Drain to return a number of shards to your shard deck, you may remove that many counters from this card instead.

augments.name: Banner of Vabrilily
augments.effect:
Arrive - Place three counters on this card. Once per turn, when a Air unit is returned to your hand from the field - You may remove one counter from this card: If you do, switch target shard to active.
At the end of each turn - Destroy this card if it has no counters.

augments.name: Glory, the Sealed Blade
augments.effect:
Equip only to a unit with cost (4) or more. It gains Brawler (This card can attack active and exhausted units the turn it comes into play).
When the equipped unit destroys a unit in battle - You may sacrifice the equipped unit: If you do, put into play "Glory, Awakened Hero" from your deck or discard zone.

augments.name: Ketsu, the Living Armor
augments.effect:
Equip to target unit.
Any damage it would take is reduced by 500 instead.
When one of your Light units attacks - You may equip this card from the discard zone to that unit.
A unit may only be equipped with one "Ketsu, the Living Armor".

augments.name: Sigil of Exile
augments.effect:
Exhaust, Pay (1): Put a counter on this card.
Exhaust, Sacrifice this card: Expel target unit your opponent controls with cost X. (X equals the number of counters this card had.)

augments.name: Sigil of Loss
augments.effect:
Exhaust, Pay (1): Put a counter on this card.
Exhaust, Sacrifice this card: Expel X target cards in your opponent's discard zone. (X equals the number of counters this card had.)

augments.name: Sigil of Renewal
augments.effect:
Exhaust, Pay (1): Put a counter on this card.
Exhaust, Sacrifice this card: Add target card with cost X from your discard zone to your hand. (X equals the number of counters this card had.)

augments.name: Stasis Sentinel
augments.effect:
At the end of your turn - Place one counter on this card.
Sacrifice this card with four or more counters: Put into play a Sentinel unit token with Destroyer (Unit * Argent/4000).

augments.name: Transmutation Circle
augments.effect: Exhaust, Offering 1 (Expel one unit from your discard zone.): Send the top card of your deck to the discard zone.

augments.name: Underground Mech Base
augments.effect:
Exhaust, discard one Mecha Unit from your hand: Draw one card then place one counter on this card.
Sacrifice this card with three or more counters: Put three target "Shard-Mecha" Units with different names from your discard zone into play.

augments.name: Air Celestial Crystal
augments.effect:
You can only control one "Air Celestial Crystal".
Your Air tower gets +500 defense.
Arrive - If your champion or spirit is Air, recover a shard.
Discard this card: Recover a shard. Use this only if you control an "Air Celestial Crystal".

augments.name: Golden Rose Blade
augments.effect:
Equip only to target Knight unit. The equipped unit gets +500 and gains Unblockable. (Guardian cannot be used when this card attacks.)
Whenever your opponent plays a spell - You may add this card from your discard zone to your hand.

augments.name: Jubei's Crystal Ball
augments.effect:
Exhaust, pay (X): Look at the top X cards of your deck. You may add a Magimaze card among them to your hand. Place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
Exhaust, sacrifice this card: Search your deck for a Magimaze card and add it to your hand. Use only while you control "The Great Magimaze".

augments.name: The Great Magimaze
augments.effect:
You can only control one "The Great Magimaze".
This card comes into play with five Maze counters on it.
Exhaust: If this card has no Maze counters, destroy it, and if you do, you win the game.

augments.name: Water Celestial Crystal
augments.effect:
You can only control one "Water Celestial Crystal".
Your Water tower gets +500 defense.
Arrive - If your champion or spirit is Water, draw a card.
Discard this card: Draw a card. Use this only if you control a "Water Celestial Crystal".

augments.name: Witch Queen's Ring
augments.effect:
Equip to target unit.
Whenever the equipped unit attacks - Draw a card, then discard a card.

augments.name: Astralic Regalia
augments.effect:
Equip to target unit. The equipped unit gets +500.
Basic units equipped with this card gain Guardian, Target Attack, and get +1000 instead.

augments.name: Hokken Market
augments.effect: Pay (2): Draw a card. Both players may use this ability.

augments.name: Hokken Warding Amulet
augments.effect:
Neither player can target cards in discard zones.
Neither player can activate the abilities of cards in discard zones.
You can only control one "Hokken Warding Amulet".

augments.name: Hyldia, Astralic Sanctum
augments.effect:
Exhaust, pay (1): Target Light unit you control gets+1000 this turn. If it's a basic unit, draw a card.
Exhaust, sacrifice this card and a Light unit: Recover target unit. If it's a basic unit, draw a card.

augments.name: Kumakori's Totem
augments.effect:
Water units get +500 for each Stunned unit your opponent controls.
Ruined - You may Stun target unit.

augments.name: Mezozia, the Primal Caldera
augments.effect:
Exhaust: Dinosaur units you control get +500 this turn.
Exhaust, sacrifice this card: If you control four or more shards and a Dinosaur unit, deal 1000 to target unit or target face-up tower.

augments.name: Shardwork Heart
augments.effect:
Equip only to target "Shardwork" unit.
The equipped unit ignores Animate.

augments.name: Snowtop Village, Pengardia
augments.effect:
Exhaust: Expel target Water unit you control.
Exhaust, pay (2): Put target Water unit expelled by this card into play.

augments.name: Temple of the Forgotten
augments.effect:
Triggered abilities of units with cost equal to the number of counters on this card do not trigger.
Exhaust: Choose one.
* Put a counter on this card.
* Remove a counter from this card.

augments.name: Zonama, the Sacred Forest
augments.effect:
This card costs (1) less to play if you control a Beast or Elemental unit. If you control a Beast and an Elemental unit, this card costs (2) less to play instead.
At the end of your turn - Recover any number of shards you control up to the number of different Air units you control.
